resources.string: I am Computer Science graduate, worked for VentureDive one of the top five software house in Pakistan known for its Technology Solutions that develops and invests in mobility in location based products that change the world by delivering lifestyle improvements. My job responsibility includes, developing web applications using Spring Boot 1.5 and Java 1.8, design software architectures, perform code reviews etc.
